entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: Sunny near noon then a mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 24 this morning and minus 17 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Tuesday 07 March 2023
